content: Demands connect to play store. Something fishy Developer says Google doing it. I cross checked, it not true. He is lying I keep getting same answer from developer. Why should a picture combiner app have access to internet? The job is simple and can be easily done offline. I have paid you, so why are you insisting on a internet connection? What information are you collecting. And if you continue to give such lame answers. Then I would prefer to move to another app. Thanks!
replyContent: You have to have an active internet connection when first launching our app, so the license for the PRO version can be verified. There is definitely nothing fishy going on, we are a reputable developer, our apps are scanned and verified by Google Play Protect. Feel free to contact us at "zombodroid@gmail.com" if you have any questions. Thank you!

content: It's simple and easy to use, and gets the job done. replyContent: Our privacy policy was created by a professional privacy policy service, which understands A/B testing policies on Google's side. Is there a specific part of the privacy policy you're not satisfied with? Our app does not collect any personal data from you, all statistical data is anonymous. Thank you for your feedback!
